name: tt-relief-map
description: Simple setup for a local Node Express API for GET/POST requests. Also includes Procfile for Heroku deployment

scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && yarn build" "cd server && yarn build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd server && PORT=5000 yarn start"
